title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 21-D - Notice (denial or withdrawal of application; removal of child)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. B, Adoption Forms, form 21-D - Notice (denial or withdrawal of application; removal of child)

State Regulations
D.R.L. ยง 115-C Form 21-D
S.C.P.A. ยง 1725 (Temporary

Guardianship)
12/97
FAMILY COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF
________
In the Matter of the Temporary
(Docket)(File) No. Guardianship of A Child Whose

First Name is NOTICE
(Denial or Withdrawal of

Application; Removal of

Child)
________
TO: PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that on the day of, 19: () the petition of for an order of
temporary guardianship was denied. () the petition for adoption filed by has
been
(he) (she) executed the same. () the child,, has been removed from the
physical custody of. () the order dated the day of, 19, granting temporary guardianship of the child,, to has expired without the entry
of a final order of adoption. The law requires this notice to be sent to
you. You may wish to consult a lawyer about your legal rights at this
time. Dated:, 19. Form 21-D page 2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
